mapper.select:
select a.id as tb_product_sku_id, a.name as tb_product_sku_name,
b.id as tb_product_spu_id, b.spuName as tb_product_spu_name,
c.id as tb_product_category_id, c.name as tb_product_category_name,
d.id as tb_product_attr_id, d.name as tb_product_attr_name,
e.id as tb_product_attr_value_id, e.value as tb_product_attr_value_value,
g.id as tb_product_spec_id, g.name as tb_product_spec_name,
h.id as tb_product_spec_value_id, h.value as tb_product_spec_value_value
from tb_product_sku a left outer join tb_product_spu b on a.tb_product_spu_id = b.id left outer join tb_product_category c on c.id = b.tb_product_category_id
left outer join tb_product_attr d on c.id = d.tb_product_category_id left outer join tb_product_attr_value e on d.id = e.tb_product_attr_id right outer join tb_product_sku_attr_value f on (d.id = f.tb_product_attr_id AND e.id = f.tb_product_attr_value_id)
left outer join tb_product_spec g on c.id = g.tb_product_category_id left outer join tb_product_spec_value h on g.id = h.tb_product_spec_id right outer join tb_product_sku_spec_value i on (g.id = i.tb_product_spec_id AND h.id = i.tb_product_spec_value_id);
mapper.sql: id, number, name, introduce, show_in_shelve, shelve_time, shelve_by, update_time, update_by, show_in_top, show_in_nav, show_in_hot, create_time, create_by, pic_image, search_key, price, stock, tb_product_spu_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_product_sku
order by ${orderByClause}
